name: Li'l Pac-Man
description:
Created by Playskool in 2000, Li'l Pac-Man is a game intended for young audiences. As Pac-Man, you move left and right while catching ghosts. If a ghosts moves past you, you lose a life.

Li'l Pac-Man never officially surfaced beyond its initial test-marketing phase with K-Mart  This unofficial recreation is meant to serve as a more accessible way to play the game; you can play on your browser, or download the game to your PC or Android device.

I originally made this for the Internet Archive a few months ago; I would have uploaded it here earlier, but I couldn't figure out how I wanted to distribute it. In the end, I decided to just give it the usual standalone release.
